title: The historie of Titana, and Theseus Very pleasant for age to avoid drowsie thoughts: profitable for youth to avoide wanton pastimes: so that to both it brings the mindes content. Written by W. Bettie.
author: Bettie, W.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by J. Beale] for Robert Bird, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Laurence Lane, at the signe of the Bible,
